title: Museum of Bad Art
summary: The Museum of Bad Art (MOBA) is a privately owned museum whose stated aim is "to celebrate the labor of artists whose work would be displayed and appreciated in no other forum".[1] It was originally in Dedham, Massachusetts and is currently in Somerville, Massachusetts.[2]  Its permanent collection includes over 700Â pieces of "art too bad to be ignored", 25 to 35 of which are on public display at any one time.[3]
